name: add_spreadsheet_row
description: Adds a row to a spreadsheet with all the information about the injury

body_part.description: The body part that is injured

mild_description.description: The description of the injury when it is mild

moderate_description.description: The description of the injury when it is moderate

severe_description.description: The description of the injury when it is severe

mild_min_healing_duration.description: The minimum healing duration of the injury when it is mild

mild_max_healing_duration.description: The maximum healing duration of the injury when it is mild

moderate_min_healing_duration.description: The minimum healing duration of the injury when it is moderate

moderate_max_healing_duration.description: The maximum healing duration of the injury when it is moderate

severe_min_healing_duration.description: The minimum healing duration of the injury when it is severe

severe_max_healing_duration.description: The maximum healing duration of the injury when it is severe

self_recovery.description: The self recovery of the injury

immediate_remedies.description: The immediate remedies of the injury

when_to_see_doctor.description: When to see a doctor for the injury

mild_min_pain_level.description: The minimum pain level of the injury when it is mild

moderate_avg_pain_level.description: The average pain level of the injury when it is moderate

severe_max_pain_level.description: The maximum pain level of the injury when it is severe

common_causes.description: The common causes of the injury

risk_factors.description: The risk factors of the injury

treatment_types.description: The treatment types of the injury

treatment_side_effects.description: The treatment side effects of the injury

physiotherapy_exercises.description: The physiotherapy exercises of the injury

long_term_remedies.description: The long term remedies of the injury

potential_chronic_injuries.description: The potential chronic injuries of the injury

specific_body_part.description: The specific body part of the injury

diagnosis_methods.description: The diagnosis methods of the injury

recovery_rate.description: The recovery rate of the injury

professional_help_frequency.description: The frequency of professional help for the injury

home_treatment_expectation.description: The home treatment expectation of the injury

doctor_recommendation.description: The doctor recommendation of the injury

surgery_requirement.description: The surgery requirement of the injury

lowering_risk.description: The lowering risk of the injury

treatment_goals.description: The treatment goals of the injury

prevention_measures.description: The prevention measures of the injury

initial_and_delayed_symptoms.description: The initial and delayed symptoms of the injury
